devdoc.author: Kresko
devdoc.details: Structs do not create views for members.

params._amount: The amount of the collateral asset to calculate the collateral value for.
params._collateralAsset: The address of the collateral asset.
params._ignoreCollateralFactor: Boolean indicating if the asset's collateral factor should be ignored.

returns._0: The collateral value for the provided amount of the collateral asset.

params._amount: The amount of the Kresko asset to calculate the value for.
params._ignoreKFactor: Boolean indicating if the asset's k-factor should be ignored.
params._kreskoAsset: The address of the Kresko asset.

returns._0: The value for the provided amount of the Kresko asset.

devdoc.title: View functions for protocol parameters and asset values

collateralAsset(address).notice: Get the state of a specific collateral asset

collateralExists(address).notice: Returns true if the @param _collateralAsset exists in the protocol

getCollateralValueAndOraclePrice(address.notice: Gets the collateral value for a single collateral asset and amount.

getKrAssetValue(address,uint256,bool).notice: Gets the USD value for a single Kresko asset and amount.

krAssetExists(address).notice: Returns true if the @param _krAsset exists in the protocol

kreskoAsset(address).notice: Get the state of a specific krAsset
